content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining Drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Burner Mining Drill at position (x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a Chest at position (x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.

### Stone Furnace at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a Furnace at position (x=41.0, y=-82.0) for smelting stone into iron plates.

### Coal Storage at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (x=42.5, y=-83.5) for storing coal.

### Coal Storage at position(x=43.5, y=-79.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (x=43.5, y=-79.5) for storing coal.

### Coal Storage at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (x=44.5, y=-81.5) for storing coal.

### Coal Storage at position(x=45.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Chest at position (x=45.5, y=-80.5) for storing coal.

### Burner Inserter at position(x=43.5, y=-80.5)
Consists of a Burner Inserter at position (x=43.5, y=-80.5) for transferring items between entities.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
- Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction.
- Make sure to check the chest's inventory before extracting items.

### Errors when using a burner mining drill
- Ensure the drill has fuel before attempting to mine.
- Empty the chest at the drop position to continue mining when it is full.

### Errors when using a furnace
- Ensure the furnace has ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt.
- Make sure to check the furnace's warnings before attempting to smelt.
